meanings.definition: A thing added or to be added.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to bring any addendums to the project.
meanings.sent2: The contract included several addendums to clarify the terms.
meanings.sent3: The party planner brought colorful addendums to the decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a box of surprises, each idea an addendum waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with beautiful flowers, each one a lovely addendum to the landscape.

meanings.definition: An item of additional material added at the end of a book or other publication.
meanings.sent1: The author included interesting addendums in the appendix of the book.
meanings.sent2: I always check the addendums at the end of a textbook for extra information.
meanings.sent3: The cookbook had delicious addendums for dessert recipes.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like addendums, adding depth and richness to the story.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit had fascinating addendums that enhanced the visitor's experience.
